name: Galleons
overview: Mountainous seas, shipwrecks, collisions with other ships, pirate raids. They are all part of one of the world's greatest adventures: the search for gold on the Spanish Main. As you ship sets out on its journey you will need all of your brain and brawn to find the clues to the treasure and then to hand on to it. You could become unbelievable rich or depressingly dead.
